api_list.name: getUsers
api_list.description: Get information about users from API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://asferro-recrut.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asferro-recrut.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://asferro-recrut.p.rapidapi.com/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "asferro-recrut.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
